entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
